name: Drozd – Addons for Elementor
author: Urchenko

sections.description:
Expand the capabilities of the page building Elementor using our plugin Drozd. The plugin includes a collection of addons that will make your next WordPress page more beautiful. The plugin contains a collection of widgets to create a full news site, blog.

Check the Demos

The largest collection of widgets for displaying posts

Currently, there are 20 widgets in the collection, you can see them here.

Fully customizable

Each widget has many settings. You can customize the design as you wish, everything is limited only by your imagination.

Quick support

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us via the feedback form.

For this plugin required the Elementor Page Builder

If you need to make a custom widget, write to us.

If you like this plugin – rate it 5 stars by clicking on the link.

26+ free widgets

  1. Posts Grid You can create a full-fledged news portal using our 20 widgets output posts.

  2. Image Box This widget has 12 display styles. He will definitely be useful to you.

  3. Flip Box Use our Flip Boxes to create beautiful dynamics on your website.

  4. Contact Form 7 Using this widget, you can change the design of Contact Form 7 at your own discretion.

  5. Info Box This widget has a huge number of settings. I advise you to look at the demo examples to see its functionality.

  6. Feature List The functional widget that will decorate your page. It has a large number of settings.

  7. Tooltip You can use this widget to add tooltips for Icon, Image, Text or shortcodes.
sections.installation:
How to Install Drozd Addons for Elementor?

Before you begin, make sure that you have installed & activated Elementor Plugin on your website. Follow these steps below to install Drozd Addons for Elementor.

Step 1: Go to WordPress dashboard and go to wp-admin – > Plugins – > Add New. Then, in the search box, type the keyword “Drozd-Addons for Elementor”. Then click “Install Now”.

Step 2: After the installation is completed, click on the “Activate” button and “Drozd – Addons for Elementor” will be activated.

Step 3: Once you have successfully completed Step 2 you can use our addons.
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You cannot use without Elementor since it\’s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It will work with any theme where Elementor works.
